byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and ROB HARMS

abstract: Denver Nuggets trade point guard Ty Lawson to Houston Rockets in exchange for first-round 2016 pick, cash considerations and four players; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Denver received a protected first-round pick in 2016, four plays and cash from Houston.

headline.main: Nuggets Trade Ty Lawson to Rockets

snippet: Denver received a protected first-round pick in 2016, four plays and cash from Houston.
